data.trans_hint: Màu sắc của chiếc váy này rất phù hợp với đôi giày của bạn.
data.en_hint: The colour of this dress matches your shoes.
data.content_game_1: The colour of this dress matches your shoes.
data.answer_en_hint: The colour of this dress matches your shoes.

data.trans_hint: Chiếc váy màu đỏ thật đẹp, giống như bông hoa hồng trong vườn vậy.
data.en_hint: The red dress is beautiful, like a rose in the garden.
data.content_game_1: The red dress is beautiful, like a rose in the garden.
data.answer_en_hint: The red dress is beautiful, like a rose in the garden.

data.en_hint: The butter is yellow in color.
data.content_game_1: The butter is yellow in color.
data.answer_en_hint: The butter is yellow in color.

data.trans_hint: Chiếc áo khoác màu đen rất đắt, cô ta thích vẻ tối màu của nó.
data.en_hint: The black coat is very expensive, she likes the darkness of it.
data.content_game_1: The black coat is very expensive, she likes the darkness of it.
data.answer_en_hint: The black coat is very expensive, she likes the darkness of it.

data.content_game_1: The snow is white.
data.answer_en_hint: The snow is white.

data.trans_hint: Em gái tôi nói rằng đỏ hay tím thì sẫm quá, nó thích màu hồng sáng.
data.en_hint: My younger sister says red or purple are too dark, she likes the brighter pink.
data.content_game_1: My younger sister says red or purple are too dark, she likes the brighter pink.
data.answer_en_hint: My younger sister says red or purple are too dark, she likes the brighter pink.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã mặc chiếc váy với chấm xanh lá nhìn giống như lá cây vậy.
data.en_hint: I wore that skirt with the green spots that look like tree leaves.
data.content_game_1: I wore that skirt with the green spots that look like tree leaves.
data.answer_en_hint: I wore that skirt with the green spots that look like tree leaves.

data.trans: Có màu xanh nước biển, xanh da trời
data.content_game_1: The sky is blue.
data.answer_en_hint: The sky is blue.

data.trans_hint: Tôi thích màu sáng, cam và vàng là màu yêu thích của tôi.
data.en_hint: I like bright colours, orange and yellow are my favourites.
data.content_game_1: I like bright colours, orange and yellow are my favourites.
data.answer_en_hint: I like bright colours, orange and yellow are my favourites.

data.trans_hint: Màu tím vi-ô-lét là màu ưa thích của tôi, đó cũng là tên của một loài hoa.
data.en_hint: Violet is my favourite colour, and it is also the name of a beautiful flower.
data.content_game_1: violet is my favourite colour, and it is also the name of a beautiful flower.
data.answer_en_hint: violet is my favourite colour, and it is also the name of a beautiful flower.
